atlantis_talk_01_botan_01:
So this is the inside of the Great Crater of
Paldea—Area Zero...[VAR 0114(0008)]
atlantis_talk_01_botan_02:
Feels different from just seeing it in our
textbooks. It’s so intense...[VAR 0114(0008)]
atlantis_talk_01_rival_01:
Normally we’d never be able to get in here to
see it for ourselves![VAR 0114(0004)]
atlantis_talk_01_friend_01:
It seems like it got spooked by something.
It’s hiding in its ball.[VAR 0114(0006)]
atlantis_talk_01_botan_03:
Can we even get back up to the surface
without it?[VAR 0114(0008)]
atlantis_talk_01_friend_02: Ah, should be all right. The last time I was here...[VAR 0114(0006)]
atlantis_talk_01_friend_03:
I caught a Flying Taxi out of the crater. They
always come through, if you’re a real sob story...[VAR 0114(0006)]
atlantis_talk_01_botan_04:
Why didn’t you just call the professor, if [VAR 1107(00FF,0001)]she’s
down here? Don’t get along or something?[VAR 0114(0008)]
atlantis_talk_01_friend_04: Tch! None of your business, pipsqueak.[VAR 0114(0006)]
atlantis_talk_01_botan_05:
Geez, no need to bite my head off. What’re you
getting all huffy for anyway?[VAR 0114(0008)]
atlantis_talk_01_rival_04:
OK, come on, you two! This is an adventure!
Let’s just have a good time![VAR 0114(0004)]
